Author: snefferu
Text: Gaining is tough, I’m finding it a struggle to reach my target even though I set it myself so I understand how you’re feeling about it. Could you set yourself a realistic target like gain 0.5? Then after you’re comfortable with it move up a little more. This is how I’ve been managing it, when you have a lot to gain it can seem overwhelming but if you take baby steps it’s more manageable. Good luck!
